comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content:
The caption at the bottom of the photograph indicates that this is the Martin's Creek Viaduct of the New Line, DL&WRR. It is a smaller version of the Tunkhannock Viaduct. Construction began in 1912 and ended in 1914. It is also known as the Kingsley Bridge, located at Kingsley, PA. It spans Route 11 and Martin's Creek.

Coordinates:
41°44'38.70"N
75°45'9.60"W
